N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 227.4 - Modification of approved devices

State Regulations
(a) Permission to use an approved device is effective only for those types which
are of the same design and construction as the type approved. If the
manufacturer of an approved device changes its materials, construction, or
design in a manner that may affect its operation, accuracy or safety, the
sponsoring utility or the utility intending to use the modified device shall
notify the commission staff, specifying the changes. (b) The commission will evaluate the effects
of the modification and determine whether the device remains acceptable, and if
so, whether the existing approval is adequate or should be amended, and will so
notify the utility. Notes
